articles.title: NAMYANG DAIRY PRODUCTS launches Matchaae-mong in four South Korean convenience stores
articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.summary: Namyang Dairy Products is launching 'Matchaae-mong,' a new matcha-flavored chocolate milk, in four convenience store chains (CU, GS25, 7-Eleven, Emart). The product, characterized by a combination of Chocoae-mong's rich taste and matcha flavor, experienced sellouts during pre-sales and aims to improve customer access through convenience store availability.

articles.title: Mrbeast Ventures into Mobile Telecommunications: Launching His Own Mobile Company Amidst Shifts from Traditional Phone Systems
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: MrBeast has launched a new mobile carrier, MrBeast Mobile, operating as an MVNO and leasing capacity from T-Mobile. It offers competitive pricing, including a $5/month plan with 5GB of data and a $25/month unlimited plan. The service emphasizes a digital-first experience and incorporates a philanthropic component, donating a portion of revenue to charitable causes.

articles.title: 9 Major Limitations Of Older iPhones You Need To Know Before You Buy
articles.author: Nadeem Sarwar
articles.summary: Apple's iPhone 15 series introduces several changes compared to previous generations, including the departure of the Lightning port. These updates are also available on Apple's more affordable offerings. Choosing an older iPhone model means missing out on these core features and improvements found in the iPhone 15 series.

articles.title: 30 Affordable Fashion Swaps For The Expensive Versions
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Various affordable products are introduced as alternatives to expensive brands. These include ruffled pajamas similar to Piyama, sunnies with a gold frame, ankle socks comparable to Aritzia, golden bracelets resembling Cartier, walking shoes as an alternative to Hokas, and high-waisted biker shorts similar to Lululemon. Other new products are mentioned like seamless underwear similar to Victoria's secret, lightweight legging-style joggers comparable to Lululemon's Align joggers, a faux-leather bag similar to Polène's Cyme, a cherry bag charm similar to Coach, and a scoop-neck top similar to Skims.

articles.title: Finally, a Samsung phone that I'd put my S25 Ultra away for (especially at this price)
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Edge is evaluated favorably, particularly due to its current price point offsetting perceived flaws. The price makes the product appealing.

articles.title: Why Jay Williams Left Real Estate to Create America's Best New Beverage Brand
articles.author: Free Bird
articles.summary: Jay Williams left his real estate career to found Free Bird Southern Spring Water, a beverage company offering spring water in a can. He launched Free Bird to create something fun and unpretentious and provide an elevated drinking experience. Free Bird is a premium non-alcoholic beverage brand redefining how we socialize and celebrate-without the hangover.

articles.title: LOOK INSIDE: Discover Lidl's unique shopping model in NJ
articles.author: Erin Vogt
articles.summary: Lidl has expanded its presence in New Jersey with over two dozen stores. The stores carry around 80% private label products, sourced through partnerships with local and regional farms and suppliers. Lidl aims to keep overhead low by efficient shelving, eliminating unnecessary costs, and implementing a 'bring your own bag' policy.

articles.title: BASS launches BASSnet Neo, the Next-Gen Maritime Native Cloud Solution
articles.author: system
articles.summary: BASS Software announces the launch and renaming of its flagship product suite to BASSnet.

articles.title: Amazon launches Lens Live, an AI-powered shopping tool for use in the real world
articles.author: Crunch
articles.summary: Amazon introduced Lens Live, a real-time component to its existing visual search tool, Amazon Lens. Lens Live enhances Amazon Lens by adding real-time capabilities for product discovery.

articles.title: Amazon will sell you the Samsung S25 Edge for $400 off right now - it's lowest price ever
articles.author: Kerry Wan
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Edge, an ultra-thin and lightweight smartphone, is now available at a reduced price of $699 on Amazon. Equipped with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, One UI 7, and 12GB of RAM, the phone offers solid performance for tasks like gaming and AI applications. It is designed to compete with Apple's upcoming iPhone 17 Slim.

articles.title: Starbucks is adding protein to its coffee menu. Here
articles.author: Yahoo Daily News
articles.summary: Starbucks is launching a new product called protein coffee. This new offering expands Starbucks' beverage options and introduces a coffee drink with added protein.

articles.title: Sam's Club's $10 Freezer Find Is the Perfect ‘Low Carb, High Protein' Post-Workout Fuel
articles.author: Fred Hernandez
articles.summary: Tyson has introduced Simple Ingredients Chicken Nuggets, available in Original and Spicy flavors for $10 per 3-pound bag. These fully cooked nuggets feature all-natural white-meat chicken, mozzarella, and parmesan cheese, offering 23 grams of protein and one carb per serving. Preparation methods include air frying, oven baking, or microwaving.

articles.title: Sam's Club's $10 Freezer Find Are the Perfect ‘Low Carb, High Protein' Post-Workout Fuel
articles.author: Fred Hernandez
articles.summary: Tyson has introduced new Simple Ingredients Chicken Nuggets, available in Original and Spicy varieties, for $10 per 3-pound bag. These nuggets contain all-natural white-meat chicken, mozzarella, and parmesan cheese, offering 23 grams of protein and one carb per serving, with no gluten or added sugar. They can be prepared in an air fryer, oven, or microwave.

articles.title: MELTDOWN: North Carolina Football HUMILIATED in 48-14 Disaster
articles.summary: KAGS offers a mobile application, the KAGS app, for streaming KAGS content on your phone. This app enables users to access KAGS on their mobile devices.

articles.title: Genius Gourmet expands Costco reach with viral protein drinks
articles.author: Marc Lutz
articles.summary: Genius Gourmet has launched new SKIPPY protein bars and nut rolls in Costco stores in the Pacific Northwest, Southeast, and Northeast regions of the U.S. Their 30-gram Sparkling Clear Protein drink has gone viral and is selling quickly at Costco Nationwide. Genius Gourmet is also planning on launching new products and retail partnerships.

articles.title: Fastrack MYND AI-powered smartwatch launched: Price in India, availability and more
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Fastrack has launched Fastrack MYND, an AI-powered smartwatch priced at Rs 3,999. The smartwatch features AI-enabled personalization, contextual reminders, AI Search, Voice Command, a 4.9 cm Curved AMOLED display, and a comprehensive health and fitness suite. It is available at Fastrack stores, Titan World outlets, leading retailers, e-commerce platforms, and their website.

articles.title: Amazon's Lens Live AI shops for anything you can see
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Amazon has launched 'Lens Live,' a new feature within its iOS Shopping app that enables users to identify and shop for products by scanning their surroundings with their camera. The feature uses object detection to match scanned items with products on Amazon's marketplace, offering a swipeable carousel with options to add items to cart or wishlist. Lens Live also integrates Amazon's AI assistant Rufus to provide product summaries and answer questions.

articles.title: Not just discounts: Flipkart's Tech Day 2025 signals a deeper shift
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Flipkart is focusing on platform-first innovation and preparing for The Big Billion Days (BBD) 2025. The company is signaling how AI will influence the future of shopping. Flipkart Tech Day 2025 indicates significant developments.

articles.title: Amazon's ‘Lens Live' mobile shopping feature uses camera and AI to find real-time product matches
articles.author: Kurt Schlosser
articles.summary: Amazon is launching 'Lens Live,' a new feature in its shopping app that enhances camera-shopping capabilities. Using a mobile device camera, shoppers can instantly find real-time matches and similar items on Amazon, along with product information generated by Amazon's AI shopping assistant, Rufus. The feature is currently available for select U.S. customers on iOS and will roll out to all U.S. customers in the coming months.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils Dual-Foldable Smartphone: Key Features and Launch Date on September 29
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is launching a new double foldable smartphone on September 29. The device features a 7.6-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X main display and a 6.2-inch Super AMOLED cover display, powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 or Exynos 2400, and equipped with a versatile triple-lens rear camera system.

articles.title: Amazon launches Lens Live, an AI-powered shopping tool for use in the real world
articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.summary: Amazon launched Lens Live, a new AI-powered upgrade to its Amazon Lens shopping feature, allowing visual searches for products using a phone's camera. The feature integrates with Amazon's AI shopping assistant, Rufus, for product insights and is powered by Amazon SageMaker services and runs on AWS-managed Amazon OpenSearch. Lens Live is initially launching on the Amazon Shopping app on iOS for U.S. shoppers.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A17 Unveiled: New 5G Mid-Range Smartphone with Advanced AI Features Arrives in India
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy A17 5G in India, targeting 100 million Galaxy A series sales. The Galaxy A17 5G features a 50MP camera, a 5000 mAh battery, and AI capabilities, aimed at tech-savvy, budget-conscious consumers in the growing 5G smartphone market.

articles.title: Not just discounts: Flipkart's Tech Day 2025 signals a deeper shift
articles.author: Boudhaditya Sanyal
articles.summary: Flipkart's Tech Day 2025 revealed platform-first innovations in preparation for The Big Billion Days (BBD) 2025, emphasizing AI's role in shaping the future of shopping. New initiatives include an app redesign, AI-powered search and recommendation engines, expansion of content commerce, the Flipkart Black subscription, and AI-powered seller tools. These advancements aim to improve customer experience and operational efficiency.

articles.title: DreamCloud Mattress Sale: Last Call To Save Up To 65% On Editor Favorites
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering significant discounts on their mattresses and bedding bundles, including mattresses, bases, and sheet sets, as part of their Labor Day mattress sale.

articles.title: Yeti's New Color Doesn't Just Look Cool. It's Quietly Functional
articles.author: Jack Seemer
articles.summary: Yeti has introduced a new color, 'Moon Dust,' to its product line, marking only the fourth time it has offered a textured finish. This new finish provides enhanced grip and is available at standard Yeti pricing, starting at $25 for the 16-ounce stackable Rambler cup. Yeti account holders get first access to the 'Moon Dust' collection on the official website.

articles.title: Looks like Lenovo's Legion Go 2 will have the most advanced handheld screen yet.
articles.author: Sean Hollister
articles.summary: The article covers news and updates related to handheld PC gaming devices, specifically mentioning the Steam Deck and ROG Ally. It also includes information regarding Lenovo, possibly related to their involvement in the PC gaming sector. This suggests potential announcements, updates, or releases related to these products or companies within the handheld PC gaming revolution.

articles.summary: KENS 5 offers streaming services on phones through their newly launched KENS 5 app.

articles.title: Google Gives Away $200 To Pixel 10 Buyers In New Limited-Time Offer
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Google is offering a new promotional voucher for a limited time. This offer presents a chance for users to obtain a $200 voucher.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Price Slashed In Last Labor Day Deal
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Ultra is now available at a heavily discounted price for a limited time.

articles.title: Samsung's Trifold Phone and AI Glasses Reportedly Set for Sept. 29 Launch
articles.author: Alex Valdes
articles.summary: Samsung is planning to launch its Galaxy Z TriFold smartphone in South Korea on September 29th, during its third Unpacked event of 2025. At the same event, the company will also introduce its Project Moohan mixed reality headset and AI smart glasses.

articles.title: Congress returns from summer recess with full agenda
articles.summary: KENS 5 requires users to download the KENS 5 app to stream content on their phones. This indicates the launch or availability of the KENS 5 app for mobile streaming.

articles.title: Shake things up with an AI mixologist
articles.summary: Weber Ranch Vodka is introducing an AI mixologist service. The AI mixologist is the first of its kind from the brand.

articles.title: AI-Powered Image Generator Emerges as the Ultimate Creative Tool
articles.summary: Text2Pixel, an AI-powered image generator, has launched a new iOS application that transforms text prompts into high-quality visuals. The app, designed for both casual users and professionals, offers features like instant image generation, style selection, and customization tools, making it accessible for creating visuals on mobile devices. Text2Pixel is now available for download on the Apple App Store.

articles.title: The Absolute Best Hair Pomades For Men You Can Get In Canada Right Now
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: AG Hair offers a pomade designed for a natural look. The pomade provides a medium hold with a non-greasy, semi-gloss formula.

articles.title: WordPress shows off Telex, its experimental AI development tool
articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.summary: WordPress has introduced an early, experimental AI development tool called Telex, demonstrated at WordCamp US 2025. Telex allows users to create Gutenberg blocks for WordPress websites by inputting prompts and receiving a .zip file that can be installed as a plugin. The launch aligns with WordPress's formation of an AI team to develop AI products.

articles.title: Matt Bonner: San Antonio Spurs' Devin Vassell is the team's X-factor. Is he right?
articles.summary: KENS 5 offers streaming services accessible via the KENS 5 app, enabling users to watch KENS 5 on their phones.

articles.title: Samsung's AI Jet Ultra Vacuum Review: Smarter, Stronger, and Built for Pet Hair
articles.author: Jerri Ledford
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Bespoke AI Jet Ultra cordless stick vacuum, a high-end cleaning device designed for busy, pet-friendly homes. This vacuum features AI-informed cleaning adjustments, a self-emptying dust cup, and long battery life and is capable of handling multiple floor types. It is recommended for its powerful cleaning and flexible use with additional tools available.

articles.title: As we await the iPhone Fold, trifolds are becoming a thing
articles.author: Ben Lovejoy
articles.summary: Samsung plans to launch its first trifold phone this year. Huawei has already released its second-generation model. Huawei's Mate XT offers a triple foldable display with three screen sizes: 6.4 inches (single screen), 7.9 inches (dual screen), and 10.2 inches (triple screen).

articles.title: The three iPhones you won't be able to update soon - including 2019's bestseller
articles.author: Jen Mills
articles.summary: Apple's iPhone XR, the bestselling phone of 2019, will become near obsolete as it will not be able to download the latest iOS 26 software update. While still usable with security patches, the device will miss new features, prompting users to upgrade to newer models like the iPhone 16 series, potentially generating significant e-waste.

articles.title: McDonald's Is Introducing a Fancy, New Limited-Edition Sauce—And We Can't Wait to Try It
articles.author: Nina Derwin
articles.summary: McDonald's is launching a new limited-edition Special Edition Gold Sauce inspired by North Carolina BBQ flavors. The sauce will be available starting September 3rd and can be paired with items like the Special Edition Gold Snack Wrap, Bacon Special Edition Gold McCrispy Sandwich, and McCrispy Strips.

articles.title: Building for Billions: Flipkart Unveils the Tech Powering Next-Gen Shopping
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Flipkart is preparing for The Big Billion Days 2025 with significant updates to its platform. The company is introducing a refreshed app experience featuring a personalized homepage and AI-powered search. Furthermore, Flipkart is launching a new Flipkart Black paid loyalty program to provide exclusive benefits for its users.

articles.title: BMW to unveil ‘superbrain' EVs in bid to challenge Chinese rivals
articles.summary: BMW is launching the iX3 sport utility vehicle, the first model developed on its Neue Klasse platform. This launch is part of BMW's plan to introduce 40 new models and model updates in the next two years. BMW CEO Oliver Zipse stated that the new BMW iX3 will set a new benchmark in the industry.

articles.title: Snag major savings on new mattress and bedding during Tuft & Needle's Labor Day sale
articles.author: Nina Derwin
articles.summary: Tuft & Needle is offering discounts up to 27% on mattresses and up to 50% on bedding accessories during its Labor Day sale, happening now through September 10. The T&N Mint Hybrid Mattress is discounted to $1,018 for a queen size, and the T&N Mint Mattress is on sale for $1,035. Customers can also save on items such as quilts, metal bases, and box foundations.

articles.title: Watch: BYD Yangwang U8 SUV Jumps Into Water And 'Swims' Casually
articles.summary: BYD's YangWang U8, a mass-production SUV, features amphibious capabilities, allowing it to 'swim' in water for up to 30 minutes. Equipped with a 'Floating Mode' that activates upon detecting high water levels, the U8 switches off the petrol engine, raises suspension, closes windows, and uses an Individual Wheel Drive System to navigate in water. The SUV can also perform tank turns and crab walks, similar to other electric vehicles.

articles.title: Sponsored Content: Easy Back-to-School Meals with McCain Foods USA
articles.author: Hannah Ross
articles.summary: Amazon curates a new releases page on its online marketplace. This page showcases some of the hottest products that have gone on sale within the last seven days.

articles.title: RALtoday Shares September Events in the Triangle
articles.author: Amber Freeman
articles.summary: Amazon's online marketplace features a new releases page. This page curates some of the hottest products put on sale within the last seven days.

articles.title: Riley's Army Triangle Events Supporting Childhood Cancer Awareness Month
articles.author: Amber Freeman
articles.summary: Amazon curates some of the hottest products that have gone on sale in the last seven days on its new releases page.

articles.title: Crown Laboratories, Inc. Announces PanOxyl® Acne Wash Has Been Certified as the #1 Selling Acne Wash in Canada
articles.author: Revance
articles.summary: Crown Laboratories' PanOxyl Acne Wash has been recognized as the #1 Acne Wash in Canada by NielsenIQ. The product, formulated with 4% benzoyl peroxide, is designed for daily use on sensitive, acne-prone skin and is available nationwide at major drugstores and online retailers.

articles.title: Avontic Redefines Luxury Smartwatch Accessories with Titanium Precision and Modern Design
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Avontic, a brand specializing in high-end mobile accessories, has launched new smartwatch bands and cases crafted with aerospace-grade materials. The company aims to provide customers with products that enhance their devices and reflect their lifestyles.

articles.title: The House Of Suntory Launches Haku Yuzu, Its First Flavored Vodka
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Haku Vodka has extended its product line for the first time with the launch of a flavored version.

articles.title: Monday, September 1st: Labor Day Facts, Riley's Army Triangle and RALtoday
articles.author: Amber Freeman
articles.summary: Amazon curates a 'new releases' page on its online marketplace. This page features popular products that have gone on sale within the past week.

articles.title: Glenmorangie's Spice-Forward Single Malt Was Finished Across Four Cask Types
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Glenmorangie launched Glenmorangie A Tale Of Spices. It is the sixth release in the distillery's 'A Tale Of' series.

articles.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong will have a free Nintendo Switch 2 edition upgrade at launch, meaning you don't have to pay extra to get the 120hz mode
articles.author: Scott McCrae
articles.summary: Hollow Knight: Silksong, announced in 2019, is launching alongside the Nintendo Switch 2, providing a free upgrade for owners of the original Nintendo Switch version. Unlike some titles, a Nintendo Switch 2 version of Silksong will be available at launch.

articles.title: Emma Raducanu lands new brand deal and explains why after US Open exit
articles.author: Tom Parsons
articles.summary: Tennis star Emma Raducanu partnered with personal care brand Wild as their global ambassador. Wild launched a new advertising campaign featuring Raducanu to promote their roll-on deodorant, emphasizing the theme of 'Big wins start with small changes'.

articles.title: Nespresso Vertuo Next review: I've tested the Veruto Plus, Pop and Evoluo, here's why this one is my favourite from the brand's pod machine line up - but not at full price
articles.author: DANIELLE AMATO
articles.summary: The Nespresso Vertuo Next is a pod coffee machine compatible with larger Vertuo pods, capable of making coffee in seven sizes via barcode reading. It features a slimline design and comes in six colors. The machine is easy to use with one-button operation, though accessing settings requires instruction reading.

articles.title: Google Maps' Secret Upgrade on Android 16 Could Change How You Navigate Forever
articles.author: Jose Enrico
articles.summary: Google is enhancing Google Maps on Android 16 with Live Updates, allowing users to monitor real-time progress of deliveries, flights, rides, and navigation directly from the lock screen, status bar, and Always-On Display. The feature, initially limited, is being rolled out with more comprehensive support expected in Android 16's Quarterly Platform Release (QPR2).

articles.title: NYSE Content Advisory: Pre-Market update + S&P 500 ends August up nearly 2%
articles.summary: Bed Bath & Beyond celebrates its corporate name change. ProShares ETFs marks a decade serving clients with their Ex-Sector ETFs.

articles.title: Ingredients Showdown: Crest Plus Scope vs. Health Ranger's Silver Fresh Toothpaste
articles.author: Robert Lee
articles.summary: Crest Plus Scope and Silver Fresh are two toothpaste products. The comparison likely highlights the features and benefits of each toothpaste, aiding consumer choice.

articles.title: Unstoppable Domains and 0G Foundation Announce .AGI, the Naming Standard for the Intelligent Internet
articles.author: Chainwire
articles.summary: Unstoppable Domains and 0G Foundation have partnered to launch the .AGI top-level domain for AI builders, researchers, and companies. The .AGI pre-sale is now live, with onchain minting on the 0G blockchain expected in Q1 2026. The companies also plan to apply for .AGI in ICANN's next gTLD application window.

articles.title: My favorite cooking gadget is getting a big upgrade
articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
articles.summary: Vorwerk has launched the Thermomix TM7 in the US for $1,699. This all-in-one kitchen machine features a larger 10-inch touchscreen, redesigned aesthetics, open-lid cooking, a larger steaming basket, and a rebuilt software platform. The previous model, Thermomix TM6, which launched in 2019, has been discontinued, but Vorwerk commits to 10 years of support.

articles.title: Pacvue Launches 'Every Click' Campaign, Bringing AI-Powered Commerce Operating System to Life
articles.author: Pacvue
articles.summary: Pacvue launched its 'Every Click' brand campaign to promote its AI-powered Commerce Operating System. This system aims to solve commerce media fragmentation and data overload by acting as a central point for planning, activation, optimization, measurement, insights, and outcomes.

articles.title: Do Wyze's 2025 cameras really benefit from AI features?
articles.author: Marty Spargo
articles.summary: In 2025, Wyze introduced an updated range of cameras featuring the notable addition of artificial intelligence. This move signifies Wyze's commitment to smart functionality within its home monitoring products.

articles.title: Eazztree – Best Web Development Service Provider
articles.summary: Eazztree is recognized as a top web development company, providing digital solutions, including web development services, designed to enhance online presence and drive growth. They also offer AI and Machine Learning services aimed at providing smarter business solutions.

articles.title: Samsung's trifold might be launching pretty soon
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Samsung is planning to launch its first trifold phone and its upcoming Project Moohan XR headset, possibly as early as this month or September. Huawei is set to launch its second-generation foldable phone, the Mate XTs, this Thursday.

articles.title: Snowball Launches $300K Buzzdrop on ChainGPT Pad
articles.author: Chainwire
articles.summary: Snowball has launched a $300,000 Buzzdrop on ChainGPT Pad. The Buzzdrop rewards community contributions with token allocations. The roadmap includes the MNS Beta release, AI Reputation Engine launch, LayerZero integration, MetaMask Snaps, ENS claiming support, and multi-chain expansions.

articles.title: King's Hawaiian and NFL Canada score big with new partnership
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: King's Hawaiian products, including Original Hawaiian Sweet and Savory Butter flavors, are now available at Loblaws', SaveOn Foods, Metro, Sobey's, and Walmart locations. The company also offers slider buns, hamburger buns, and pretzel bites.

articles.title: Lenzing unveils digital platform to boost supply chain efficiency
articles.author: Jangoulun Singsit
articles.summary: Lenzing has launched Lenzing Pro, a new digital platform designed to improve supply chain efficiency. The platform offers various features, including a fibre product catalog, brand licensing tools, and certification support, aimed at assisting Lenzing's global customer and partner network in decision-making and marketing strategies. It supports stakeholders like spinners, fabric mills, and brand partners in various activities related to Lenzing fibres.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold launch date leaked online, design and key specs tipped
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z TriFold, a triple-screen foldable smartphone, on September 29. The phone is expected to be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and will be showcased alongside Samsung's XR headset (Project Moohan) and Galaxy AR glasses at the Galaxy Unpacked event. It will also support wireless charging and NFC, as per the video.

articles.title: What is and how to buy with guarantees from Spain
articles.summary: Hacoo, an international online marketplace specializing in fashion, accessories, and gadgets, has launched in Spain. It connects buyers with vendors, primarily based in Asia, offering a wide range of items at lower prices. The Hacoo platform offers its service through an app, available for Android and iOS.

articles.summary: Apartments.com suggests where people should begin their search for a new place. This indicates Apartments.com offers a service related to finding apartments.

articles.title: Vodacom SA wins pop customer experience award
articles.author: AKANI CHAUKE
articles.summary: Vodacom South Africa received the Ask Africa Orange Index Award, recognizing its customer experience leadership. Vodacom has introduced the TOBi chatbot, the VodaPay super app, and a multilingual customer care centre to improve customer interactions and provide innovative service excellence.

articles.title: MGA Entertainment Unleashes Ninjombie™: Ninjas, Zombies, and Slime Collide in Explosive New ...
articles.author: MGA Entertainment
articles.summary: MGA Entertainment is launching Ninjombie™, a new boys action franchise that combines toys, digital play, and content. The franchise features undead martial arts masters engaging in battles.

articles.title: M&S announces major store change to make shopping 'even easier' for customers
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: M&S has launched a new section in its food halls to highlight new lunch items, featuring green labels and banners. The new section showcases items like the Butter Chicken Wrap, Katsu Sando, and Chicken Tikka Sandwich. M&S also introduced a frozen version of its Colin the Caterpillar cake.

articles.title: You may be waiting until November to buy the Samsung tri-fold – and even then finding one could be tricky
articles.author: David Nield
articles.summary: Samsung is planning to unveil its first tri-fold smartphone at an event on September 29, but its release might be delayed until November. Initially, only 50,000 units will be produced, with availability potentially limited to South Korea and China as Samsung assesses market response to the new device.

articles.title: 48 Boring But Useful Products
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: SweatBlock introduces antiperspirant wipes to prevent sweat stains. Medicube launches 'Zero Pore' Pads, a Korean skincare product with lactic and salicylic acid for exfoliation and pore refinement. Rael introduces 'Miracle Invisible Spot Cover' Pimple Patches, featuring hydrocolloid technology to remove pore-clogging gunk.

articles.title: 30 Products In Amazon's 'Most Wished For' Section That Are Totally Worth The Hype
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: A user review highlights a new skincare product that effectively softens feet by removing dead skin, providing immediate results and leaving feet feeling exceptionally soft. The product is easy to use and gentle on the skin.

articles.title: It will last you 20 years and I talk to mine: Why a Henry vacuum is still a household favourite
articles.author: Emilia Hitching
articles.summary: Numatic has launched new additions to the Henry vacuum family, including the Henry Quick Pet, a modern stick vacuum with scent capsules for pet owners, and the Henry Quick Pro, a versatile stick vacuum that converts to a handheld with a Flexi Hose. The article reviews and compares different Henry models, highlighting their features and performance, catering to various cleaning needs and preferences.

articles.title: Windows 11 has a hidden feature in testing that could be a real timesaver for Android phone owners
articles.author: Darren Allan
articles.summary: Microsoft's Windows 11 is introducing a clipboard syncing feature, accessible via the Link to Windows app, which allows users to copy text on their PC and immediately paste it on their Android phone. This functionality, currently in a preview build, aims to enhance integration between Windows 11 and Android devices by enabling seamless text transfer. The feature is accessible across any keyboard app.

articles.title: A New $4,000 Limited Edition Shows Why English Whisky Has Come Of Age
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: The English Distillery is launching two new elevated whisky products this month. These products are expected to potentially elevate the English whisky category and achieve new retail heights.

articles.title: Hear Me Out: Instant Coffee Is, in Fact, Good
articles.author: Meet Your
articles.summary: Onyx Coffee Lab released an instant coffee Advent calendar featuring a different coffee for each of the 25 days of December, described as a 'fun, monthlong tasting adventure'. Swift Coffee partners with many roasters, produces many instant coffees, and offers bulk pouches and 48-pack boxes.

articles.title: Home Bargains reduces £2.49 ‘youth boosting' eye cream by 83%
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Home Bargains is offering the Victoria Harper Youth Boosting Eye Cream for £2.49, reduced from £15. Other products in the Victoria Harper range, including the Youth Boosting Face Cream (£3.49), Essential Toner (£2.99), Mystical Facial Cleanser (£2.99), and Mystical Cream (£3.99), are also available at Home Bargains online. The Victoria Harper products are designed to hydrate, nourish, and revitalize skin.

articles.title: Innovating the AI-Powered Factory: A Conversation with Arpit Chhabra, CEO of IoTfy
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: IoTfy introduces ZenO, a proprietary Manufacturing Execution System (MES), designed to bridge the gap between traditional and smart manufacturing. ZenO provides real-time tracking, intuitive dashboards, and actionable alerts, digitizing the complete production workflow and leveraging AI/ML for predictive analytics to improve First Pass Yield (FPY). It delivers IoT-driven real-time tracking, intuitive dashboards, and actionable alerts across every production stage.

articles.title: Why AI in Drive-Thrus Keeps Stumbling, And How Hi Auto Plans to Change That
articles.author: Charlotte Mckinsey
articles.summary: Hi Auto has rebranded with a new website and a focus on trust and relatability for its AI order-taking service, which already boasts high order completion and accuracy rates. The company is introducing a character named 'Auto' to personify their technology, aiming to make it more approachable for restaurant staff and customers. Hi Auto is positioning itself to expand its AI solutions beyond drive-thrus to kiosks and delivery integrations.

articles.title: History Happenings: Sept. 2, 2025
articles.author: Amanda Armstrong
articles.summary: In 1865, Phalon & Sons druggist advertised Night Blooming Cereus, promising it to be the 'most exquisite, delicate, and fragrant perfume.'

articles.title: Amazon has launched its cloud services in New Zealand
articles.author: Cryptopolitan
articles.summary: Amazon has officially launched its Amazon Web Services (AWS) cloud services in New Zealand. This launch follows a 2021 announcement to invest over NZ$7.5 billion in data centers. AWS plans to facilitate local customer access to cloud computing services for applications, data storage, and compliance.

articles.title: Indiana Township woman launches mobile laundry service in Fox Chapel area
articles.author: Joyce Hanz
articles.summary: Meghan Hughes launched Meghan's Laundry Service in June, offering mobile laundry services that include pickup, delivery, washing, drying, and folding. The service charges a flat $5 pick up and delivery fee and $35 per large bag of clothes.  The service caters to customers within the Fox Chapel Area School District, including senior citizens, busy moms, and professionals.

articles.title: 2026 Cupra Leon price and specs: Facelifted small car gets new wagon, hybrid options
articles.summary: Cupra is introducing a facelifted version of the Leon for 2026. The updated small car will feature new wagon and hybrid powertrain options, expanding the existing lineup.

articles.title: Dawn Bread Brings Home the Crunch with New 'Bread Crumbs' and 'Panko Crumbs'
articles.author: Sponsored
articles.summary: Dawn Bread has launched Classic Bread Crumbs and Panko Crumbs in 250g and 500g packs. The Classic Bread Crumbs are fine and even, suitable for binding and adding texture, while the Panko Crumbs are light and flaky, designed for Japanese-style tempura and crisp-fried seafood. These crumbs are made from fresh dough using controlled fermentation and electrode baking technology, ensuring consistent quality and extended shelf life.

articles.title: NIO unveils first UAE hub to drive smart EV growth
articles.author: Rajiv Pillai
articles.summary: NIO has launched its first NIO Hub in Dubai, UAE, offering an integrated ecosystem for customers. The hub showcases NIO's products, including vehicles, and services like aftersales and lifestyle engagement. It also features a NIO Cafe.

articles.title: KONGA103.7FM Spotlights Samsung's Sleek New Devices for Everyday Living
articles.author: Bella Naija.com
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its latest flagship smartphones: the Galaxy Fold 7, Flip 7, and Flip 7 FE, featuring AI-driven productivity and advanced security through Samsung Knox. The devices are available for purchase with flexible payment options, including installment plans on Konga.com, and are supported by Samsung Care Plus for after-purchase service.

articles.title: Lava Blaze AMOLED 2 review: Great budget 5G device with no bloatware
articles.summary: Lava launched the Blaze AMOLED 2, a slim 5G smartphone priced at Rs 13,499. The phone features a 6.67-inch full HD+ AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, MediaTek's Dimensity 7060 chipset, a 50MP camera, and a 5,000mAh battery with a 33-watt charger.

articles.title: Clean Craft: Revolutionizing India's Laundry Franchise Landscape
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Clean Craft is introducing a technology-driven laundry service franchise model in India, targeting entrepreneurs and aiming to blend affordability with profitability. The franchise utilizes advanced technology and training to meet the growing demand for organized laundry services, particularly in Tier 2 and Tier 3 cities.

articles.title: Check Out These 31 TikTok-Approved Products If You Want To Be The Friend Who Knows About All The Cool Stuff
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: Nyx launched Lip IV Hydrating Gloss Serum, a pigmented gloss that doubles as a long-lasting lip stain. Dumpling Daughter introduced Spicy Sweet Soy sauce, a condiment suitable for various culinary applications. Fisher-Price released a DJ table for toddlers, featuring interactive elements and over 100 songs and sounds.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Smoothie King introduces food menu in Middletown locations
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Smoothie King is introducing its first food menu across New Jersey, including at its Middletown location. Customers can order avocado toast and protein boxes starting September 2. This launch enhances the smoothie experience offered by the company.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro XL review: Smarter, faster, and better cameras
articles.summary: Google has launched the Pixel 10 Pro XL, featuring the new Tensor G5 chipset. The phone boasts improvements in camera performance, a refined display, and Gemini AI integration, including features like Magic Cue, Circle To Search, Gemini Live, and Pixel Studio, enhancing the user experience.

articles.title: 노터치 자동세차 ‘씻자' 동탄 직영점 오픈
articles.summary: Mark Chain, operating under the car wash brand 'CITZA,' has opened a new direct-operated car wash in Dongtan New Town, Gyeonggi Province. This multi-purpose car wash features a no-touch automatic car wash, an indoor self-service car wash, and an indoor drying zone. Mark Chain plans to expand to nearby cities.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1 5G Variant Coming Soon in India, Lava Mobiles Shares Teaser Hinting Imminent Launch; Check Details
articles.author: Kalpesh Sharma
articles.summary: Lava Mobiles is preparing to launch the Lava Bold N1 5G smartphone in India, a new variant of the Bold N series. This launch follows the introduction of the Lava Bold N1 4G in May 2025, with details on the 5G model's price, specifications, and features expected to be revealed soon.

articles.title: Menulog employs AI to localise its ‘What's Good in Your Hood' platform
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Menulog launched a hyperlocal advertising campaign, 'What's Good in Your Hood,' to promote local restaurants across Australia. The campaign features customized audio and video assets, with close to 500 restaurants appearing in the ads. This initiative aims to support local businesses by featuring them in hyperlocal ads designed to celebrate and drive value back into their operations.

articles.title: China builds washing machine that can clean clothes in space
org: China Astronaut Research and Training Center
articles.summary: The China Astronaut Research and Training Center has developed a compact, detergent-free washing machine for astronauts. This innovative device utilizes mist and ozone to clean and sterilize up to 800gm of clothing with only 400ml of water, providing a solution for maintaining clean clothes during space missions.

articles.title: 29 Money-Saving Target Products Worth Every Penny
articles.author: John Mihaly
articles.summary: Energizer offers a charger for rechargeable batteries. Shark introduced an air purifier with HEPA filter. Johnson & Johnson provides a first aid kit. Keurig has reusable K Cups. Bialetti offers a Moka espresso maker. Reel Paper sells bamboo paper towels. Brita created a water filter pitcher. OXO designed a compost bin. Stasher offers reusable food bags. Tide provides stain remover pens, and Bose launched QuietComfort Bluetooth wireless headphones.

articles.title: Pacvue Launches 'Every Click' Campaign, Bringing AI-Powered Commerce Operating System to Life
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Pacvue launched its 'Every Click' brand campaign to showcase its AI-powered Commerce Operating System. The operating system aims to solve commerce media fragmentation and data overload by providing a unified platform for planning, activation, optimization, measurement, and insights. It is designed to transform data chaos into clarity for brands and agencies.

articles.title: New WhatsApp feature: Create, save stickers directly to your tray with no need of sending
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: WhatsApp is testing a new feature in its Android beta version (2.25.24.23) that allows users to create and save custom stickers directly to their sticker tray without needing to send them first. This update enhances customization and creative expression, complementing existing sticker capabilities like AI-generated stickers based on text prompts. The feature is expected to roll out to all Android users after successful testing.

articles.title: Sharing text between your Windows and Android devices is about to get incredibly easy
articles.author: Simon Batt
articles.summary: Microsoft is developing a new 'shared clipboard' feature for Windows 11, allowing users to copy text between their PC and Android devices via the Link to Windows app.  The feature, currently in the Dev testing branch, automatically syncs copied text across devices and works with various keyboard apps, including Gboard and Samsung Keyboard.

articles.title: Amaysim reveals ‘The Escape: Multi Product' campaign
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Amaysim has launched a new multi-product campaign, "The Escape Story: Multi Product," showcasing its mobile, NBN, and device offerings. The campaign, created in-house using AI, builds on the success of its predecessor and aims to provide customers with better value across mobile, internet, and devices. It is now live across national broadcast and digital platforms.

articles.title: The future of fashion: How AI is dressing up Kenya's style scene
articles.author: Rukia Bulle
articles.summary: Liz Muthoni of Lizzie Fashions (Thrift Loft) utilizes AI to generate images of models showcasing her thrifted clothing, saving time and money on traditional photoshoots. This allows her to present polished images for her online shop, offering a cost-effective solution for her business.

articles.title: Pippit launches 'Agent Mode,' a smart engine to turn any idea into a ready-to-share video
articles.author: Nickie Louise
articles.summary: Pippit has launched Agent Mode, a new feature on its content creation platform that uses AI to generate complete, ready-to-share videos from a single prompt. Agent Mode is designed for creators, brands, and entrepreneurs, allowing them to quickly produce high-quality videos for marketing, branded campaigns, or creative projects. The platform also includes other AI-driven tools like Product Showcase, AI Design, Link to Video, and AI Talking Photo.

articles.title: Discover Carpet Care Revolutionizes San Antonio Residential Cleaning with Complete Price Transparency Initiative
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A leading San Antonio carpet cleaning company launched a redesigned website on September 1, 2025. The website features upfront pricing, intended to eliminate customer uncertainty and build trust in the company's home cleaning services.

articles.title: Samsung launches new phone model
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its new Galaxy A17 5G smartphone, an affordable AI-powered device. The Galaxy A17 5G is designed with a slim profile and lightweight build, incorporating AI features, enhanced display, and camera capabilities. According to Aditya Babbar, Vice President, MX Business, Samsung India, the Galaxy A series democratizes flagship innovations at affordable prices.

articles.title: Cata Debuts Game-Changing All-in-One App Platform for F&B and Retail Operators
articles.author: Media Outreach
articles.summary: Cata launched its Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) app platform for F&B operators and retailers. This platform enables businesses to launch their own branded mobile apps for ordering, marketing, omni-channel loyalty programs and CRM without coding.

articles.title: Voice AI at the frontline: Control or creativity?  Campaign India
articles.summary: Klarna introduced an OpenAI-powered service bot that handles two-thirds of customer queries, resulting in a $40 million cost reduction while improving customer satisfaction. The bot operates with guardrails, automating transactional issues but escalating financial advice to human agents. This demonstrates how companies are launching and implementing AI-driven services to enhance customer interactions and improve operational efficiency.

articles.title: Voice AI at the frontline: Control or creativity?
articles.summary: Klarna reported that its OpenAI-powered service bot managed two-thirds of customer queries and cut costs by $40 million, while improving satisfaction. The bot operated with guardrails: transactional issues were automated, but financial advice was escalated to humans. The integration of voice AI for customer engagement necessitates carefully calibrated autonomy to enhance personalization and efficiency while mitigating risks to brand integrity and compliance.

articles.title: Plano neighbors push back after dog attack leaves woman injured
articles.author: Meredith Yeomans
articles.summary: A Walmart shopper emptied a Gain detergent bottle on the floor, claiming it was half full. This incident raised questions about whether Gain detergent bottles contain the advertised volume and if customers are getting their money's worth. Procter & Gamble, Gain's owner, previously faced a lawsuit alleging false claims about the number of laundry loads its detergent bottles could handle.

articles.title: Samsung's robot vacuum cleaner wins top gov't IoT security rating
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co. launched its latest robot.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7 Is A Winner, Except For Two Things
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung introduced a new foldable phone with flagship features. The phone has some drawbacks.

articles.title: Best Picks reviews new Kindle Colorsoft and here's why it has converted me from team paperback
articles.author: Ariana Pezeshki
articles.summary: Amazon has launched the Kindle Colorsoft, featuring a 7-inch color display, waterproof design, and glare-free screen. The new Kindle also boasts an impressive eight-week battery life and a distraction-free reading experience with no notifications.

articles.title: With 135 FAST Channels and rapid viewer CTV takeup, LG Ads is keen to grow local relationships
articles.author: Dan Barrett
articles.summary: LG Ads offers advertising on the LG TV home screen and LG Channels, its FAST channel service.  They have also introduced "screen saver ads", a new advertising format. As of August 2025, LG Ads has 135 FAST channels in Australia.

articles.title: Will drones deliver your next hot food order?
articles.author: BBC News
articles.summary: A Swedish firm anticipates drones will create a new market. The drones will be utilized for hot food delivery.

articles.title: BREWERS POSTCAST: Brewers COLLAPSE After Hot Start
articles.summary: WeAreIowa offers streaming services accessible via the WeAreIowa app on mobile phones.

articles.title: EV explainer: Three reasons I love a good frunk
articles.author: Tim Eden
articles.summary: The article highlights the benefits of 'frunks' (front trunks) in electric vehicles, citing examples from Tesla Model 3/Y, Mustang Mach-E, Lucid Air, and Xiaomi YU7. These benefits include extra storage space, a wet storage area, and a separate compartment for food, preventing odors in the car's cabin.

articles.title: Launch Dominator Unveiled: AI-Powered Launch Jacking Software Automates Affiliate Content for Product Launches
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Launch Dominator is an AI-powered platform automating reviews, emails, and bonuses. This helps affiliate marketers create E-E-A-T ready, SEO-optimized content and scale product launch campaigns.

articles.title: Discover Cool Jazz
articles.author: Billings Gazette
articles.summary: Next year, Supertunia Vista petunia will be launched. This new product will allow consumer to 'Jazz up' their baskets, containers and boxes.

articles.title: How are new online games changing the industry?
articles.author: This Gen Gaming
articles.summary: GTA V improved upon GTA IV, and expectations are high for GTA VI to surpass its predecessor upon its release. Rockstar Games' upcoming GTA VI is anticipated to be significantly better than GTA V.

articles.title: The Standard Shopping Shortlist: What to shop, see and know in September 2025
articles.author: London Evening Standard
articles.summary: This month features fresh launches and new shopping experiences, implying the introduction of new products or services to the market. The content focuses on recent releases and innovations available for consumers.

articles.title: M&S reveals newborn clothing essentials ready for September's birth rate peak
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: M&S has revealed a new collection of newborn essentials, encompassing items from baby grows to socks. This introduces parents to a curated checklist of essential products.

articles.title: Trump Mobile posts, then deletes new rendering for T1 Phone. When will it be released?
articles.author: The Palm Beach Post
articles.summary: Trump Mobile launched the Trump Mobile wireless carrier service and the T1 smartphone. The T1 phone features top-tier performance, a sleek design, and powerful features.

articles.title: Classic Wines of California Expands Portfolio with Next Century Spirits
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Classic Wines of California, a distribution arm of Bronco Wine Company, partners with Next Century Spirits (NCS). The partnership will bring NCS's award-winning spirits to California retailers and consumers. Next Century Spirits represents a unique approach to the modern beverage landscape.

articles.title: MrBeast has plans for a phone company in the mold of Ryan Reynolds' Mint Mobile
articles.author: system
articles.summary: MrBeast (Jimmy Donaldson) plans to launch a mobile-phone service, a mobile virtual network operator (MVNO). The focus will be on marketing and sales, with other aspects outsourced.

articles.title: Nespresso Vertuo Next review: I've tested the Veruto Plus, Pop and Evoluo, here's why this ...
articles.author: The Daily Mail
articles.summary: Nespresso's Vertuo Next is a pod coffee machine.

articles.title: Amazon's Lens Live AI shops for anything you can see
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Lens Live, a new feature in the Amazon Shopping app. This feature uses the device's camera to scan real-world objects and display matching product listings within the app.

articles.title: New Bee Network night bus service for another Greater Manchester town
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: A company is preparing to launch a new service later this week.

articles.title: Jaguar Land Rover cyberattack 'severely' disrupts sales and production
articles.author: Usatoday
articles.summary: Jaguar, the luxury car brand, announced a new and colorful rebranding. The rebranding aims to reflect the spirit of its founder, Sir William Lyons.

articles.title: Samsung's Trifold Phone and AI Glasses Reportedly Set for Sept. 29 Launch
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: The Galaxy Z TriFold, potentially from Samsung, is anticipated as the world's second triple-screen phone. Availability for US shoppers is currently unknown.

articles.title: China's EV maker deliveries rebound, buoyed by cheaper new models
articles.author: system
articles.summary: BYD experienced a sales rebound in August. Nio, Leapmotor, and Xpeng all achieved new delivery records.
